title: Download: The True Story of the Internet
overview: From the founders of eBay, Yahoo, Amazon, Netscape, Goggle and other powerbrokers, experience amazing stories of how the Internet took control of our lives in 10 short years. These pioneers tell how they went from geeky nerds to 21st-century visionaries in the time it takes most people to get their first promotion. Hear straight from the people who started it all, through stories that have the makings of a best-selling thriller. How did certain upstart 20-year-olds launch a revolution from Silicon Valley and become overnight billionaires? You'll never surf the net the same way again.
